mapper.select: SELECT CHATROOM.*,O.u_no No1,t.u_no No2 FROM chat_user O RIGHT join users ON O.u_no=users.u_no FULL OUTER JOIN CHATROOM ON CHATROOM.room_no=O.room_no join chat_user T on O.room_no=T.room_no WHERE O.u_no= (SELECT DISTINCT users.U_no FROM users left join chat_user O ON O.u_no=users.u_no WHERE u_email=#{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND O.U_NO != T.U_NO order by O.room_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO CHATROOM VALUES(SEQ_CHATROOM.NEXTVAL,#{nickname}) INTO CHAT_USER VALUES((SELECT DISTINCT users.u_no FROM chat_user RIGHT join users ON chat_user.u_no=users.u_no FULL OUTER JOIN CHATROOM ON CHATROOM.room_no=chat_user.room_no WHERE u_email=#{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),SEQ_CHATROOM.CURRVAL) INTO CHAT_USER VALUES((SELECT DISTINCT users.u_no FROM chat_user RIGHT join users ON chat_user.u_no=users.u_no FULL OUTER JOIN CHATROOM ON CHATROOM.room_no=chat_user.room_no WHERE u_email=#{friendid}),SEQ_CHATROOM.CURRVAL) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: select DISTINCT O.room_no, O.u_no NO1 , T.u_no NO2 from chat_user O join chat_user T on O.room_no=T.room_no WHERE O.u_no = (SELECT DISTINCT users.U_no FROM users left join chat_user O ON O.u_no=users.u_no WHERE u_email=#{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND T.U_NO= (SELECT DISTINCT users.U_no FROM users left join chat_user O ON O.u_no=users.u_no WHERE u_email=#{friendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND O.U_NO != T.U_NO order by O.room_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into messageROOM VALUES(SEQ_MESSAGEROOM.NEXTVAL, #{message},#{time}, (SELECT DISTINCT users.U_no FROM users left join messageROOM ON messageROOM.u_no=users.u_no WHERE u_email=#{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{roomno})
